name: Fast Water Bike Sea Cup
description:
Fast Water Bike Sea Cupn is the best surf game for motorcycle rider and water bike rider. Drive your best water surfing motorbike in the ocean and the sea and drive the jet sky bike in the water to challenge the other bike surfing drivers. The water surfering game that makes you a beach surfer and perform crazy stunts in the boat driving.
features:
- Racing festival on the beach into the frozen water
- Limited time to reach the destination
- Map to guide or help you to find check points and final destination
- Moto bike racing fever in ocean
- Gorgeous view of beach and ocean
